Posts.Content: Nov 5, 2015 06:46PM MsYelv wrote: cmh417: Keep your appointment with the surgeon and discuss a biopsy or lumpectomy. I'm older than you (43), but after finding a small lump near my nipple that had started pulling it inward I was referred to mammogram and ultrasound that showed nothing. The Radiologist told me I was good and to come back in a year for my annual check. I wasn't satisfied SO Iwent to see a surgeon who said "it's not supposed to be there so let's remove it". 2 weeks later I found out that I had a very aggressive breast cancer. Trust your gut. MSYELV
Posts.Title: Not Sure What To Do Next cmh417 cmh417

Posts.Content: Jan 27, 2017 02:52AM MsYelv wrote: Hey! You are a strong, beautiful woman! It was found, and now it's time to get rid of it! Do fun things while you wait. Surgery alone will slow you down. I took a trip while waiting. I wanted to live every second that I could.
Posts.Title: I'm joining the club and so scared right now bratmobile singlemom1

Posts.Content: Aug 13, 2015 07:54PM MsYelv wrote: My procedure is scheduled for Monday! I'll find out exact time tomorrow. I say I'm ok mentally but I have had a bad headache with unpset stomach all day. I think it's my nerves. God is giving me strength!!! Praying for all of you ladies!! MsYelv

Posts.Content: Aug 18, 2015 12:09PM MsYelv wrote: I'm at home recovering from the procedure. The surgeon believes he removed a pebble sized crystallized scar tissue or hardened cyst. The biopsy will be back in 7 days. My nipple was more inverted and had dimpling even more when he went in to remove the lump yesterday. I pray everyone gets benign results! MsYelv

Posts.Content: Aug 11, 2015 09:32PM MsYelv wrote: scared89: I'm new to this forum. I found a lump in my left breast last week and GP confirmed a 2cm round lump with indentation. Mammogram and ultrasound two days later found nothing but the U/S tech commented on the ability to feel it. I was told my condition is benign but before leaving the tech gave me a look and said "further tests are between you and your doctor". I have an appt with my plastic surgeon tomorrow to get his opinion and discuss the possibility of getting a breast MRI. I will let you know what he says about the indentation

Posts.Title: Indentation scared89 keepwalking

Posts.Content: Sep 4, 2015 03:28AM MsYelv wrote: Keepwalking: my Oncologist appointment is Tuesday with surgery Thursday, it's all going so fast now. I am praying for you. I pray that God holds you in His arms while you wait for the results and that He gives you peace. I also pray that you won't hear the word that is terrifying. My family and I are keeping an upbeat humorous attitude when we're together but when the room is empty of all except one, reality sets in and it's hard to find humor alone. I'm glad you and your husband are being upbeat. If you want to have a going away party - do it! remember something - it's a part of you that will be no longer. The part that was killing you. I used to not like my hair until I'm faced with the possibility that it will be gone. MsYelv
